extendedInfo.description: Application lets you browse reported crimes by the swedish police during the last 24 hours. All data is gathered through http://brottsplatskartan.se/brottsplatsstockholm-api which is maintained by PÃ¤r ThernstrÃ¶m.The data is extracted the swedish police webpage. The gps positions are created by the police-officers during reporting.In-app images are credited to: Maps Icons Collection http://mapicons.nicolasmollet.com

reviews.title: Old information
reviews.comment: Not very up to date data. Makes it pretty useless. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Completely useless
reviews.comment: This app does only one single thing: tell me that it has unfortunately stopped.
reviews.author: A Google User
